SEARCH
Package pingPongGame.model.components

Class BallModel

java.lang.Object
pingPongGame.model.components.BallModel
public class BallModel extends Object
Model representing the properties and behavior of the game ball.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    BallModel()
    Constructor to initialize the ball model with default values.
